snippet.title: Legendary Tales Early Access Launch Trailer.
snippet.description:
Legendary Tales is a Walking Action Role Playing game developed for VR. It has a Dark Fantasy theme and is inspired by the likes of Diablo and Dark Souls and boasts a spectacular physics based fighting system. Legendary Tales also allows you to play with up to 4 friends in Co-op mode.

We've been hard at work developing this title for the past couple of years and we're going to be releasing the Early Access version in September 2021.

So what does Legendary Tales have to offer?

Fantasy ARPG
Physics-based fighting
Attribute levelling system (Str, Dex, etc..)
Combat skills and Magic (Magic will be updated after Early Access release)
New pre-designed levels to explore
Multiplayer co-op (Up to 4 players)
And A boss fight against the keeper of the dungeon, we hope you get there alive...
Look out for new enemies to fight in the future.

If you're interested in this project, you can find it on Steam at the link below : 

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1465070/Legendary_Tales/

This game supports HMD such as
HTC Vive
HTC Vive Pro
Windows MR
Valve Index
Oculus Rift
Oculus Rift S
Oculus Quest (Via Link, Air Link)
Oculus Quest 2 (Via Link, Air Link)

Join our Discord to support us and get updates about Legendary Tales

Discord Link :https://discord.gg/jRBDpFt
